top.description:
The number of items to return in the result set. Default is 10.

Note:
  - **Only supported for a task that runs a customizable playbook. Otherwise it will return an 400 error.**

orderBy.description:
Specifies the field by which the results are sorted.

Data is displayed in descending order by default.

Supported fields and operators:
* 'lastActionDateTime'
* asc - Ascending order
* desc - Descending order

Note:
  - **Only supported for a task that runs a customizable playbook. Otherwise it will return an 400 error.**
  - You can use multiple fields, separated by commas, to sort the retrieved results.

TMV1-Filter.description:
Filter for retrieving a subset of results.

Supported fields:

|Field|Description|Supported values|
|-----|-----------|----------------|
|`id`|The ID of action |Any value|
|`workflowNodeId`|The ID of workflow node|Any value|
|`target`|The name of target|Any value|
|`status`|The status of action|`succeeded`, `partiallySucceeded`, `failed`, `running`, `pendingApproval`, `approved`, `rejected`, `timeout`, `noAction`|

Supported operators:

|Operator|Description|Notes|
|-----|-----------|----------------|
|`eq`|Operator 'equal to'| - |
|`and`|Operator 'and'| - |
|`or`|Operator 'or'| - |
|`not`|Operator 'not'| - |
|`( )`|Symbols for grouping operands with their correct operator| - |

Additional functions:

|Function|Description|Notes|
|-----|-----------|----------------|
|`contains()`|Allows you to search for a specified string in a field|Only applicable to 'target'|

Note:
  - **Only supported for a task that runs a customizable playbook. Otherwise it will return an 400 error.**
  - Include this parameter in every request that generates paginated output.
